title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, QB, Raiders
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, QB, Raiders
description:
Where Colin was right and wrong

Why Colin judges the QB position stricter than others

The Raiders have had to play through a lot of distractions this season


Guest: Trent Dilfer
